|rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 28 |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Another ''RT-N12 D'' FCC filing is FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ/-RTN12D1 MSQ-RTN12D1] (01/10/2014), :HW may possibly be identical - '''[[SGE]]''' board P/N appears the same. {{see also|SGE|ASUS RT-N12 series}} ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?28373-%CD%EE%E2%FB%E9-%F0%EE%F3%F2%E5%F0-Asus-RT-N12-D1-HP ''ASUS RT-N12 B1/C1/D1/HP/VP'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?33255-DualWAN-%E2-%EF%F0%EE%F8%E8%E2%EA%E5-AsusWRT-%E4%EB%FF-Asus-RT-N10U-N12*1-N14UHP-N15U-N16-N53 ''DualWAN firmware'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] *[https://github.com/wl500g/wl500g/wiki/Devices On ''Oleg'''s '''wl500g firmware''' device table page] :specified as having 8MB Flash and 32MB RAM *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?30575-%CD%EE%E2%FB%E9-%F0%EE%F3%F2%E5%F0-Asus-RT-N12-D1-HP&s=cbfd1ba4b4675756d6b9a63035f088b3&p=258497#post258497 ''Omega'''s post about the device on the '''wl500g.info''' forums] **[http://digiland.tw/viewtopic.php?pid=11786#p11786 On the '''digiland.tw''' forums] (w/ internal shot) ::"AP699E5N3.CT124-4" is silkscreened on the board. ::[[Broadcom]] BCM5357C0 (BCM53572) based ::''ESMT'' M12L2561616A-6T (32MB) RAM *[http://tomato.groov.pl/?page_id=69 On ''Shibby'''s Tomato distro supported list] :specified as having 8MB Flash *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:52424:864#864 ''Asus RT-N12'' on '''iXBT''' forums] :OUI: 60:A4:4C ([http://oldoctober.com/files/temp_3/Asus_RT-N12_D1.jpg label])
